item.title: About Dinesh
item.description:
Namaskar/Greetings Fellow’s:

I was born and raised in Nepal, a country known for Himalaya and the birthplace of Buddha. I completed my bachelor’s degree in Agriculture science with minor in plant breeding.

I then joined West Virginia State University (WVSU) for my MS in Biotechnology. At WVSU, I worked on improving vintage tomato varieties using Marker assisted selection and background selection. I also worked on incompatibility issues while crossing heirlooms with the commercial variety.

Educational Background:

  • Doctoral degree in Plant Breeding and Genetics, Cornell University, (2023- Present)
  • Master of Science in Biotechnology, West Virginia State university (2021-2023)
  • Bachelor of Science in Agriculture, Tribhuvan University, Nepal (2015-1019)
